TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 点囊薹草 ( 原变种) dian nang tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Involucral bracts longer than inflorescence. Utricles ca. 2.5 mm. Stigmas ca. 1/2 length of utricle.
treatment.distribution: Grassland slopes, wet places in forests; 2000–3900 m. Guangdong, Xizang, Yunnan [India].
